MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.59am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to carry out repairs to our equipment in the Rack Spur area affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:16am on Sunday, 28 February 2021.
